title: Ladyward Roman Fort
description: Remains of a Roman fort have been identified between modern Lochmaben and Lockerbie in Scotland. The site -- or an as-yet undiscovered nearby settlement, sanctuary, or road station -- may have been named *Locus Maponi by the Ravenna Cosmographer.

properties.description: Coordinates from vici.org, verified in Google Earth and against aerial photos in Canmore.
properties.title: Vici.org location of Ladyward Roman Fort
